sentences.en: an attempt to recapture the city
Black has to fight in order to recapture the pawn.
sentences.cn: 黑方必须为夺回失兵而战.

sentences.en: Can the city recapture its former splendour?
sentences.cn: 这座城市还能重现其往昔的光辉 吗 ?

sentences.en: He couldn't recapture the form he'd shown in getting to the semi-final.
sentences.cn: 他没能找回闯进半决赛时表现出来的状态。

sentences.en: He ordered the army to recapture the camp at any cost.
sentences.cn: 他命令军队无论如何也要夺回营地。

sentences.en: He was recaptured after nearly two weeks on the run.
sentences.cn: 他逃亡将近两周后再次被抓获。

sentences.en: How do we recapture the intellectual high ground?
sentences.cn: 我们如何才能重新在智力上获得优势呢？

sentences.en: If I am once put off I find it very difficult to recapture the same train of thought.
sentences.cn: 我一旦受到打扰,发觉自己很难回到原来的思路上来.

sentences.en: In view of architectural position all in all, exceeding and war-weary German officer those gets · card favour (Shu Man acts the role of Thoms Clay) act under orders to recapture this foothold.
sentences.cn: 鉴于建筑的位置极其重要，极度厌战的德国军官彼得·卡恩（托马斯·克莱舒曼饰）奉命夺回该据点。

sentences.en: It is difficult to recapture the sober , even fearful - atmosphere of those days.
sentences.cn: 现在要把握当时持重的, 甚至可怕的气氛是很困难的.

sentences.en: Since Tigress had started " helping " Joy, she wanted to recapture her lost youth through him.
sentences.cn: 虎妞 “ 成全 ” 了小福子,也要在祥子身上找到失去了的青春.

sentences.en: The armed forces have launched offensives to recapture lost ground.
sentences.cn: 这支武装部队已发动进攻要夺回失去的阵地。

sentences.en: The general resolved on an approach by night recapture the lost ground.
sentences.cn: 司令员决定,夜晚之前进军收复失去的阵地.

sentences.en: Their attempt to recapture the city was foiled by a traitor.
sentences.cn: 他们重新夺回这座城市的企图被叛徒打破了.

sentences.en: These cookies seem to recapture all the textures and flavors we remember from childhood.
sentences.cn: 这些饼干似乎重新唤回了我们记忆中童年时代的那种口感和味道。

sentences.en: Vajrayana thus attempts to recapture the Enlightenment experience of the Gautama Buddha.
sentences.cn: 从而金刚乘是尝试去再体验乔达摩佛的启迪体验.

sentences.en: We of course wanted to recapture Burma.
What led to the prisoner's recapture?
sentences.cn: 靠什麽线索把那个逃犯捉回的?

words.tran_cn: 夺回；取回；政府对公司超额收益或利润的征收
夺回；拿回；再体验；政府征收再经历

trans.tran_cn: 夺回；取回；政府对公司超额收益或利润的征收
夺回；拿回；再体验；政府征收再经历
trans.tran_en: to take control of a place again by fighting for it
to catch a prisoner or animal that has escaped
